home.title: What services does Devtrios provide for businesses?
home.desc: Devtrios offers a comprehensive range of services, including custom software development, web development, mobile app development, cloud hosting, AI solutions, UI/UX design, and digital marketing.

home.title: How can Devtrios help with business growth and digital transformation?
home.desc: Devtrios supports businesses by offering scalable technology solutions that streamline operations, automate processes, and improve customer engagement to drive long-term growth.

home.title: Which industries does Devtrios serve with its technology solutions?
home.desc: We serve industries such as e-commerce, healthcare, financial services, education, and logistics by delivering industry-specific solutions tailored to their needs.

home.title: What makes Devtrios different from other technology providers?
home.desc: Devtrios stands out due to its use of cutting-edge technologies, custom-tailored solutions, and a proven track record of delivering scalable, high-quality software on time.

home.title: Does Devtrios offer ongoing support and maintenance for projects?
home.desc: Yes, we provide long-term maintenance and support for all projects, including regular updates, performance optimizations, and software scalability improvements to meet evolving business needs.

services.title: What services does Devtrios provide for businesses?
services.desc: Devtrios offers a comprehensive range of services, including custom software development, web development, mobile app development, cloud hosting, AI solutions, UI/UX design, and digital marketing.

services.title: How can Devtrios help with business growth and digital transformation?
services.desc: Devtrios supports businesses by offering scalable technology solutions that streamline operations, automate processes, and improve customer engagement to drive long-term growth.

services.title: Which industries does Devtrios serve with its technology solutions?
services.desc: We serve industries such as e-commerce, healthcare, financial services, education, and logistics by delivering industry-specific solutions tailored to their needs.

services.title: What makes Devtrios different from other technology providers?
services.desc: Devtrios stands out due to its use of cutting-edge technologies, custom-tailored solutions, and a proven track record of delivering scalable, high-quality software on time.

services.title: Does Devtrios offer ongoing support and maintenance for projects?
services.desc: Yes, we provide long-term maintenance and support for all projects, including regular updates, performance optimizations, and software scalability improvements to meet evolving business needs.

website_development.title: How long does a website development project take?
website_development.desc: Most website development projects take between 4 to 8 weeks, depending on complexity, features, and integrations. Larger or custom platforms may require additional time.

website_development.title: Do you build SEO into your website development?
website_development.desc: Yes. SEO is integrated into every website we build, including clean site architecture, mobile optimisation, performance best practices, and SEO-friendly page structures.

website_development.title: Can you redesign or rebuild an existing website?
website_development.desc: Absolutely. We regularly rebuild or redesign existing websites to improve performance, usability, and conversions while preserving valuable SEO equity where possible.

website_development.title: Which platforms do you use for website development?
website_development.desc: We work with platforms such as WordPress, Shopify, Webflow, and fully custom solutions depending on your requirements, scalability needs, and long-term goals.

website_development.title: Do you provide ongoing website support after launch?
website_development.desc: Yes. We offer website maintenance and support services to ensure your site remains secure, updated, and optimised as your business grows.

ecommerce_website_development.title: How long does an e-commerce website project take?
ecommerce_website_development.desc: Most e-commerce projects take between 6 and 10 weeks, depending on platform, catalogue size, and integrations.

ecommerce_website_development.title: Which e-commerce platform should I use?
ecommerce_website_development.desc: That depends on your business model, growth plans, and operational complexity. We help you choose the right platform.

ecommerce_website_development.title: Can you rebuild or improve an existing e-commerce store?
ecommerce_website_development.desc: Yes. We regularly rebuild or optimise existing stores to improve performance, usability, and conversions.

ecommerce_website_development.title: Do you provide ongoing e-commerce support?
ecommerce_website_development.desc: Yes. We offer ongoing maintenance, optimisation, and feature development.

wordpress_development.title: How long does a WordPress website project take?
wordpress_development.desc: Most WordPress website projects take between 4–8 weeks, depending on complexity, third-party integrations, and content readiness. Larger or highly customized builds may require additional time. We define clear milestones and timelines during the discovery phase.

wordpress_development.title: Do you use pre-built themes or custom WordPress themes?
wordpress_development.desc: We primarily develop custom WordPress themes tailored to your business needs. Custom themes provide better performance, stronger security, cleaner code, and long-term flexibility compared to pre-built themes.

wordpress_development.title: Is WordPress suitable for large or enterprise websites?
wordpress_development.desc: Yes. When properly architected, WordPress can support enterprise-level traffic, complex content structures, and advanced integrations. We design scalable solutions using best practices to ensure stability, speed, and security at scale.

wordpress_development.title: Do you provide ongoing WordPress maintenance?
wordpress_development.desc: Yes. We offer ongoing WordPress maintenance services, including security monitoring, regular updates, backups, performance optimization, and technical support to keep your website running smoothly.

shopify_development.title: How long does a Shopify development project take?
shopify_development.desc: Most Shopify projects take between 4 and 8 weeks, depending on catalogue size, customisation, and integrations.

shopify_development.title: Do you build custom Shopify themes or use templates?
shopify_development.desc: We primarily build custom or heavily customised themes to ensure performance, flexibility, and brand consistency.

shopify_development.title: Can you migrate my store to Shopify?
shopify_development.desc: Yes. We handle full Shopify migrations, including products, customers, orders, and SEO-safe URL mapping.

shopify_development.title: Do you offer ongoing Shopify support?
shopify_development.desc: Yes. We provide ongoing maintenance, performance optimisation, updates, and feature enhancements.

mobile_app_development.title: How long does a mobile app development project take?
mobile_app_development.desc: Most mobile app projects take between 8 and 16 weeks, depending on features, integrations, and platform requirements.

mobile_app_development.title: Do you build native or cross-platform apps?
mobile_app_development.desc: We build both. The choice depends on performance needs, timelines, and long-term scalability.

mobile_app_development.title: Can you improve or rebuild an existing mobile app?
mobile_app_development.desc: Yes. We regularly rebuild and optimise existing apps to improve performance, usability, and stability.

mobile_app_development.title: Do you handle App Store and Play Store submissions?
mobile_app_development.desc: Yes. We support app preparation, compliance, and submission for both platforms.

software_development.title: How long does a custom software development project take?
software_development.desc: Project timelines vary based on complexity and scope. Custom software development typically takes 8–16 weeks, with larger enterprise solutions requiring more time.

software_development.title: What technologies do you use for custom software development?
software_development.desc: We work with a wide range of technologies including React, Node.js, Python, Java, and Ruby on Rails to build scalable, secure, and high-performance applications.

software_development.title: Can you help me migrate my existing software to a new platform?
software_development.desc: Yes. We specialize in migrating legacy systems to modern platforms with minimal disruption and data loss. We ensure data integrity and continuity during the migration process.

software_development.title: Will I be able to update and maintain the software myself?
software_development.desc: Yes. We ensure the software is easy to maintain with a user-friendly backend and provide training to your team to manage the platform independently.

software_development.title: Do you provide ongoing support after the software is launched?
software_development.desc: Yes. We offer continuous support, including bug fixes, updates, and feature expansions, to ensure your software remains secure and relevant.

landing_page_development.title: How long does it take to build a landing page?
landing_page_development.desc: Most landing pages are completed within 1 to 2 weeks, depending on complexity and feedback cycles.

landing_page_development.title: Do you design landing pages for paid ads?
landing_page_development.desc: Yes. We build landing pages specifically aligned to Google Ads, Meta Ads, and LinkedIn campaigns.

landing_page_development.title: Can you optimize an existing landing page?
landing_page_development.desc: Absolutely. We regularly optimize existing landing pages to improve speed, usability, and conversion rates.

landing_page_development.title: Do you provide A/B testing support?
landing_page_development.desc: Yes. We support ongoing testing and optimisation based on performance data.

website_maintenance.title: Why do I need ongoing website maintenance?
website_maintenance.desc: Regular maintenance prevents security issues, performance degradation, and compatibility problems before they affect users or rankings.

website_maintenance.title: How often do you perform updates?
website_maintenance.desc: Updates are performed on a scheduled basis, with priority fixes applied immediately when needed.

website_maintenance.title: Can you fix an already compromised website?
website_maintenance.desc: Yes. We handle malware removal, recovery, and security hardening as part of our support services.

website_maintenance.title: Do you provide emergency support?
website_maintenance.desc: Yes. Our maintenance plans include rapid-response support for critical issues.

website_maintenance.title: Can you maintain websites built by other agencies?
website_maintenance.desc: Absolutely. We regularly take over maintenance for existing websites built on various platforms.

custom_website_development.title: How long does a custom website project take?
custom_website_development.desc: Most custom website projects take between 6 and 10 weeks, depending on complexity and integrations.

custom_website_development.title: Will we own the website code?
custom_website_development.desc: Yes. You retain full ownership of the codebase and intellectual property.

custom_website_development.title: Can our team manage content after launch?
custom_website_development.desc: Absolutely. We build intuitive CMS solutions and provide training where required.

custom_website_development.title: Do you build SEO-ready custom websites?
custom_website_development.desc: Yes. Technical SEO is built into every custom project from the start.

custom_website_development.title: Do you provide ongoing support?
custom_website_development.desc: Yes. We offer ongoing maintenance and development support post-launch.

webflow_development.title: How long does a Webflow website take to build?
webflow_development.desc: Most Webflow projects take between 3 and 6 weeks, depending on complexity and CMS requirements.

webflow_development.title: Can you migrate my existing site to Webflow?
webflow_development.desc: Yes. We handle full Webflow migrations while preserving SEO and content structure.

webflow_development.title: Is Webflow good for SEO?
webflow_development.desc: Yes. When built correctly, Webflow supports clean markup, fast load times, and strong technical SEO foundations.

webflow_development.title: Do you offer ongoing Webflow support?
webflow_development.desc: Yes. We provide maintenance, optimisation, and ongoing enhancements.

web_app_development.title: How long does a web app development project take?
web_app_development.desc: Project timelines vary based on complexity and scope. Most web app projects take between 8–16 weeks, with larger enterprise solutions requiring more time.

web_app_development.title: What technologies do you use for web app development?
web_app_development.desc: We work with modern technologies including React, Next.js, Node.js, Python, and other frameworks to build scalable, secure, and high-performance web applications.

web_app_development.title: Can you integrate my web app with third-party services?
web_app_development.desc: Yes. We specialize in API development and integration, allowing seamless communication between your web app and external services, platforms, and systems.

web_app_development.title: Are your web apps mobile-optimized?
web_app_development.desc: Yes. All our web applications are built with a mobile-first approach, ensuring optimal performance and user experience across all devices and screen sizes.

web_app_development.title: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
web_app_development.desc: Yes. We offer continuous support including bug fixes, updates, performance optimization, and feature expansions to ensure your web app remains secure and relevant.

saas_development.title: How long does SaaS application development take?
saas_development.desc: Development time varies depending on complexity. A simple MVP takes around 3-6 months, while a fully-featured SaaS product can take longer. We provide a detailed timeline after our initial consultation.

saas_development.title: What is the cost of building a SaaS application?
saas_development.desc: Costs vary based on the scope and features required. After an initial consultation, we provide an estimate tailored to your project needs.

saas_development.title: Can you help me scale my existing SaaS product?
saas_development.desc: Yes. We offer SaaS modernization services and can scale your existing platform to improve performance and accommodate a growing user base.

saas_development.title: What technologies do you use?
saas_development.desc: We use a variety of modern technologies including React, Node.js, AWS, and Google Cloud, choosing the best stack based on your project needs.

saas_development.title: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
saas_development.desc: Yes. We offer SaaS maintenance, security updates, and performance optimization as part of our ongoing support.

custom_software_development.title: What is custom software development?
custom_software_development.desc: Custom software development is the process of designing, creating, deploying, and maintaining software that is tailored to meet the specific needs of a business or user.

custom_software_development.title: How long does it take to build a custom application?
custom_software_development.desc: The timeline depends on the project's complexity. Simple applications might take a few months, while enterprise solutions could take a year or more. We provide a detailed project timeline during the consultation phase.

custom_software_development.title: Is custom software more expensive than off-the-shelf solutions?
custom_software_development.desc: While the upfront cost of custom software is higher, it provides a greater return on investment over time. Custom software eliminates licensing fees and can scale with your business, reducing the need for costly replacements.

custom_software_development.title: Can you work with my existing software and systems?
custom_software_development.desc: Yes. We specialize in integrating custom software with your current systems, creating a seamless and unified IT environment.

custom_software_development.title: What kind of support do you offer after the software is launched?
custom_software_development.desc: We offer comprehensive post-launch support, including bug fixes, performance monitoring, and feature updates to ensure your software remains secure and effective.

ios_app_development.title: How long does an iOS app development project take?
ios_app_development.desc: Most iOS app projects take between 8 and 16 weeks, depending on features, integrations, and complexity.

ios_app_development.title: Do you build fully native iOS apps?
ios_app_development.desc: Yes. We specialise in native iOS development using Swift and modern Apple frameworks.

ios_app_development.title: Can you rebuild or improve an existing iOS app?
ios_app_development.desc: Absolutely. We regularly refactor, rebuild, and optimise existing apps to improve performance, usability, and stability.

ios_app_development.title: Do you handle App Store submission and compliance?
ios_app_development.desc: Yes. We support app preparation, App Store compliance checks, and submission.

ios_app_development.title: Do you provide ongoing iOS app support after launch?
ios_app_development.desc: Yes. We offer maintenance, monitoring, updates, and feature enhancements as part of our ongoing support services.

android_app_development.title: How long does an Android app development project take?
android_app_development.desc: Most Android app projects take between 8 and 16 weeks, depending on complexity, features, and integrations.

android_app_development.title: Do you build fully native Android apps?
android_app_development.desc: Yes. We specialise in native Android development using Kotlin and modern Android frameworks.

android_app_development.title: Can you rebuild or optimise an existing Android app?
android_app_development.desc: Yes. We regularly refactor, rebuild, and optimise existing Android apps to improve performance and usability.

android_app_development.title: Do you handle Google Play Store submission?
android_app_development.desc: Yes. We support app preparation, compliance checks, and Play Store submission.

android_app_development.title: Do you provide ongoing Android app support after launch?
android_app_development.desc: Yes. We offer maintenance, monitoring, updates, and feature enhancements.

flutter_app_development.title: Is Flutter suitable for large-scale applications?
flutter_app_development.desc: Yes. When architected properly, Flutter can support complex, high-traffic applications across platforms.

flutter_app_development.title: How long does a Flutter app development project take?
flutter_app_development.desc: Most Flutter projects take between 8 and 14 weeks, depending on features and integrations.

flutter_app_development.title: Will my Flutter app feel native on iOS and Android?
flutter_app_development.desc: Yes. Flutter enables native-like performance and smooth UI when implemented correctly.

flutter_app_development.title: Can you migrate an existing app to Flutter?
flutter_app_development.desc: Yes. We support Flutter migrations and rebuilds where cross-platform efficiency makes sense.

flutter_app_development.title: Do you provide ongoing Flutter app support?
flutter_app_development.desc: Yes. We offer maintenance, optimisation, and feature development post-launch.

app_ui_ux.title: Do you design for both iOS and Android?
app_ui_ux.desc: Yes. Our designs align with both iOS Human Interface Guidelines and Android Material Design principles.

app_ui_ux.title: Can you redesign an existing app UI UX?
app_ui_ux.desc: Absolutely. We regularly redesign apps to improve usability, engagement, and conversion.

app_ui_ux.title: Do you provide developer-ready design files?
app_ui_ux.desc: Yes. All designs are delivered with clear specifications and assets ready for development.

app_ui_ux.title: Can you work with our existing development team?
app_ui_ux.desc: Yes. We collaborate closely with in-house or external development teams.

app_ui_ux.title: Do you offer UX testing and validation?
app_ui_ux.desc: Yes. Prototyping and usability validation are part of our process.

app_maintenance.title: What is included in your app maintenance services?
app_maintenance.desc: Monitoring, bug fixes, performance optimisation, security updates, backups, and OS compatibility updates.

app_maintenance.title: Why do I need ongoing app maintenance?
app_maintenance.desc: Regular maintenance prevents crashes, security issues, and performance decline that negatively impact users and revenue.

app_maintenance.title: How quickly do you respond to critical issues?
app_maintenance.desc: We offer rapid-response support with defined SLAs for critical incidents.

app_maintenance.title: Can you take over maintenance for an existing app?
app_maintenance.desc: Yes. We regularly take over maintenance for apps built by other teams after an initial audit.

app_maintenance.title: Do you support both iOS and Android apps?
app_maintenance.desc: Yes. We maintain native and cross-platform applications across both platforms.
